{{Infobox Organization |name = Cornwall Wildlife Trust |image = |image_border = |size = |caption = Trust Logo |map = Cornwall outline map with UK.png |msize = |mcaption = |abbreviation = |motto = |formation = 1962 |extinction = |type = Registered Charity |status = |purpose = Conservation and Preservation |headquarters = [[Truro, Cornwall]] |location = |region_served = |membership = |language = English |leader_title = |leader_name = |main_organ = |parent_organization = [[Wildlife Trusts partnership]] |affiliations = |num_staff = |num_volunteers = |budget = |website = [http://www.cornwallwildlifetrust.org.uk/ Cornwall Wildlife Trust] |remarks = }} The '''Cornwall Wildlife Trust''' is a charitable organisation founded in 1962 that is concerned solely with [[Cornwall]], [[United Kingdom]]. {{stack|[[Image:Cornwall Wildlife Trsut - Five Acres Reserve.jpg|thumb|Five Acres Nature Reserve]][[File:Lower Lewdon Nature Reserve - geograph.org.uk - 521695.jpg|thumb|Lower Lewdon Nature Reserve]]}} It deals with the conservation and preservation of Cornwall's wildlife and habitats managing over 50 nature reserves covering approximately {{convert|4300|acre|km2}}, amongst them [[Looe Island]]. Cornwall Wildlife Trust is part of [[The Wildlife Trusts partnership]] of 47 wildlife trusts in the [[United Kingdom]]. It works in conjunction with the [[Isles of Scilly Wildlife Trust]], and jointly produces a thrice yearly magazine called ''Wild Cornwall & Wild Scilly'' The direction and work that the Trust currently does is guided by the Cornwall [[Biodiversity]] action plan. Living Seas and Living Landscapes are two such projects. The Trust runs ERCCIS (Environmental Records Centre for Cornwall and the Isles of Scilly), a county wide database of sightings of animals and plants. It also gives [[Land use planning|planning]] advice (CEC - Cornwall Environmental Consultants) to land developers. The Trust is based at [[Allet]] near [[Truro]] in [[Cornwall]]. The headquarters and offices are adjacent to the Trust's '''Five Acres''' nature reserve.
